short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate AI powered personalized cover letters in seconds

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your job application process with our AI-powered Chrome extension. By effortlessly generating personalized cover letters based on your resume and the job descriptions, you can save time, enhance your application, and stand out to recruiters.

Features:
1. Instant Cover Letter Generation: Create tailored cover letters instantly by simply uploading your resume and the job description. Let AI handle the heavy lifting and save hours of writing.

2. Personalized Content: Our AI analyses your resume and the job description to generate unique and personalized cover letters that highlight your strengths and match the job requirements.

3. Easy Integration: Seamlessly integrates with your Chrome browser. Simply click the extension icon, copy job description and receive a polished cover letter in seconds.

4. Free Early Access: Generate upto 3 cover letters each day for FREE!

How to Use:
Check out the attached video demo for a step-by-step guide to help you get started.

We'd love to hear your feedback! Please share your thoughts after trying out the extension and help us improve this extension.
